barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to Mrs. E. M. Perry, [May —, 1825]. New contract to settle 500 families. Authority to sue for Missouri and Arkansas property.

*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Mrs. E. M. Perry, [May —, 1825]. New contract to settle 500 families. Authority to sue for Missouri and Arkansas property.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p*[May —, 1825.]*/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Sister*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*I have lately recd instructions from the *person_mentioned*Govt */person_mentioned*to attend to the *location_mentioned*Settlement */location_mentioned*of five hundred *person_mentioned*families */person_mentioned*more in this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*and shall set about it immediately—this renders it impossible for me to think of visiting *location_mentioned*Missouri */location_mentioned*for some years to come and besides— it will be a long time before I can raise the means of going there as I wish—my labors in this *location_mentioned*country */location_mentioned*altho arduous and in every way perplexing will not yield me anything for some years and then not the fortune which some have supposed—I shall benefit others much more than myself in proportion— but thank heaven I am not avericious—*/p*
*p*I wish you [to] ask the advice of *person_mentioned*Barton Ed Bates*/person_mentioned*, *person_mentioned*John Scott*/person_mentioned*, and other *person_mentioned*Lawyers */person_mentioned*relative to the *location_mentioned*mine a Burton property*/location_mentioned* and make any bargain with them you think proper, except as to engaging Money—I can pay no money now or for several years to come—if they will undertake it for an interest of the property I am agreed to give up an interest— do as you please but delay no time—*/p*
*p*Also take their advice relative to the *location_mentioned*Little Rock property*/location_mentioned* and have suit commenced on that without delay, and give them an interest in that also— You are the proper person to attend to that business— and do not delay anytime— See what can be done immediately.—*/p*
*p*Send on from the *person_mentioned*Lawyers */person_mentioned*the form of a power of attorney for *person_mentioned*brother */person_mentioned*and me to sign and instruction how it must be authenticated— it is a long distance to the*location_mentioned* seat of Govt*/location_mentioned* to have it executed before the *person_mentioned*Govr */person_mentioned*and I am myself the *person_mentioned*highest civil authority*/person_mentioned*, *location_mentioned*this side the seat of Govt*/location_mentioned* there are *person_mentioned*justices of the peace*/person_mentioned* here, called *person_mentioned*Alcaldes */person_mentioned*before whom it might be executed—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Brother */person_mentioned*started a few days ago to *location_mentioned*San Antonia*/location_mentioned* and will be absent about six weeks— I have nothing new—The Season has been very wet so far—too much so—tho the crops are very good—*person_mentioned*Mr Green DeWitt*/person_mentioned* I am told has obtained permission for the Settlement of *person_mentioned*400 families */person_mentioned*from *location_mentioned*Missouri */location_mentioned*on a River in this Province called the *location_mentioned*Guadalupe */location_mentioned**location_mentioned*about 70 miles west of this*/location_mentioned*—it is a fine country, very well waterd and very healthy—he will be on shortly from the *location_mentioned*interior */location_mentioned*and I will write by him— in the meantime see the *person_mentioned*lawyers */person_mentioned*and set about the *location_mentioned*Mine a Burton property*/location_mentioned* without delay and also the *location_mentioned*Little Rock*/location_mentioned* business you need not wait for me— it will be four or five years at least before I shall have the means of going to *location_mentioned*Missouri*/location_mentioned*—*/p*
*p*Remember me to *person_mentioned*Mr Perry*/person_mentioned* and the *person_mentioned*children */person_mentioned*and write often to your*/p*
*p*ever affectionate *person_mentioned*brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Mrs E M. Perry*/person_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
